58172.「ついてるな <pc>！\n 歴史を変える 偉大な発明品を手にできるとは\n キ:
You are truly fortunate, ! Fortunate indeed to be able to hold in your insignificant hands an invention capable
of changing the course of history! Fuahaha!!

58173.「ご主人さまは 大の どうぐ好きでンス。\n どうぐを作る前になると いつも\n:
Master loveth toolth dearly. Whenever he
inventh a new one, he geth all agitated like
thith.

58174.「よし！ さっそく 始めるとしよう！\n 少しの間だけ そこで待っておれ！:
Now it is time for my great work to commence!
All you need to do is wait right there for
a moment.

58176.「ふははは！！ なかなか 手ごわいな！！\n 少しだけ 本気を出すとするか！！:
Fuhahaha! You're quite a formidable opponent!!
In that case, I'll show you a sliver of my
true power!

58177.「よしよし！！ もうひと息だな！！: And now for the final blow...!

58178.「ふははは！ 完成したぞ！\n これこそが ワガハイの最高傑作である\n マスタ:
Fuahaha! It is complete at last. This is
my greatest masterpiece, the Master Key!

58179.「聞いて おどろけ！ マスターキーは\n 物質系やマシン系の魔物に ほどこされた:
Listen, and be amazed! The Master Key can
override orders given to Material-type and
Machine-type monsters.

58180.「命令を上書きされた それらの魔物は\n 以後 キサマの命令に従うようになる。\:
After having their orders overwritten, those monsters will henceforth obey your commands. In other words, you will become
their Master!

58181.「つまり このキーを使えば ゴーレムや\n おどるほうせきなどの魔物を 仲間にし:
With this key, you can make monsters like
Golems and Goodybags into your companions
and raise them into formidable fighters!

58182.「さらに アイテムマスタースキルを\n 伸ばしていけば どうぐを使用した時に\n:
Furthermore, by honing your Item Master
skill, you can trigger special effects when
using items in battle.

58183.「ワガハイは これらのスペシャルなことが\n できるようになった者を\n どうぐ:
I have decided to bestow the moniker of
"Item Master" on those with these skills!

58184.「そう！ 歴史に名を刻む偉業を\n ワガハイは やってのけたのだ！\n ふははは:
Yes, this creation of mine is a great feat
that will be etched into the annals of
history! Fuahahahahahahaha!!

58185.「いよっ すごいでンス～。\n ご主人さまは 天才でンス～。:
Truly amathing! You've blown the doorth wide
open, Mathter!

58186.「……ふん。説明は 終わりだ。\n これ以上 キサマと話すことはない。\n タン:
Hmph. My lecture is over. I have nothing
more to discuss with the likes of you.
Wardrobe. I'll leave the rest to you.

58187.「ご主人さまは あんなことを言ってるけど\n <pc>さんが 協力してくれて\n:
The master is saying things like that, but I'm
sure he's happy inside that <pc> is
cooperating with him.

58188.「さあ <pc>さん。\n マスターキーを 持っていくといいでンス。\n これで:
Come on <pc>. Take the Master Key
with you. With this, you can change your
occupation to item master.

58190.「さあ <pc>さん。\n マスターキーを……と言いたいところでンスが\n もう:
Come on <pc>. I would say "Master
Key..." but it seems you already have a key.

58191.「じゃあ この机の上にあるキーは\n ボクのほうで あずかっておくでンス。\n:
I'll leave the keys on this desk with you. In
exchange, I'll give you this.

58192.「ご主人さまには ひとつの夢があるでンス。\n <pc>さんが どうぐ使いとして:
The master has a dream. When <pc>
grows up to be an item master, maybe he will
tell us.

58193.「とりあえずは マスターキーの扱いに慣れて\n レベル３０以上の どうぐ使いにな:
In the meantime, you should get used to
handling the Master Key and train to become a
level 30 or above item master.

75950.「タンス しゃべりすぎだ！\n ワガハイの夢など 言わなくていい！:
Wardrobe, you talk too much! You don't have to
tell me what I'm dreaming about!
